Class RootSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.graphics.direct.RootSystem

  • public class RootSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    A union of sub-spanning trees over a molecular graph, each of which has a root atom.

    maclean
